summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate 2D intensity clipping and illumination adjustment functions, covering channel-wise processing, hard and soft clipping (both one‑sided and two‑sided), and percentile‑based illumination parameters such as lower/upper percentiles and sharpness factor.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of image preprocessing pipelines that rely on statistical intensity clipping and illumination correction, thereby preserving data quality for downstream analytical or computer‑vision tasks.
